title: Домовёнок Кузя
overview: Домовёнок Кузя is a series of Soviet puppet cartoon films about a funny brownie named Kuzya, based on fairy tales by Tatyana Alexandrova. The famous cartoon series includes four films shot in 1984 - 1987. Charming characters, voiced by Georgiy Vitsyn and Tatiana Peltzer, witty dialogues and memorable music of Mikhail Meerovich made this series one of the most popular in the history of Russian television.
